season.title: Element 1
season.detail: Palaeontologist Helena Walker awakes on an island filled with dinosaurs.

season.title: Element 2
season.detail: Helena is on the run from Nerva's scouts, when she meets a new ally called Meiyin.

season.title: Element 3
season.detail: Helena and Meiyin find new allies in a treetop village led by a Lakota warrior and his adopted daughter; a sickness ravaging the villagers brings everyone together in a quest to search Pteranodon mountain for a cure.

season.title: Element 4
season.detail: Helena and her allies attempt to liberate the prisoners at a brutal mining camp; when Helena's plans go awry, she and Alasie are captured.

season.title: Element 5
season.detail: Meiyin attempts to turn the newly liberated villagers into soldiers, but her comrade, Henry, argues against her military leadership; Nerva stages a counter-attack against John's village.

season.title: Element 6
season.detail: Imprisoned in Nerva's fortress, Meiyin recalls the tragic mistakes of her past; Helena, John and Henry attempt to stage a daring rescue.

season.title: The Meeting
season.detail: Despised by her stepmother and sister, Miyo is treated like a servant in her own home; one day, her father calls her in to discuss her future.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 01 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: About My Husband-To-Be
season.detail: Determined to be of use, Miyo wakes up early and prepares breakfast, but Kiyoka accuses her of trying to poison him and refuses to take a bite.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 02 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Our First Date
season.detail: Kaito tries to understand Miyo's past and realises that she has been treated badly all her life. The two later go out on their first date.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 03 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Episode 4
season.detail: To surprise Kiyoka with a handmade gift, Miyo goes into town to shop for some material; meanwhile, Kiyoka pays Miyo's parents a visit.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 04 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Episode 5
season.detail: Engulfed with jealousy, Kaya tries to thwart Miyo's engagement to Kiyoka. Miyo leaves the house and forgets to bring the good luck charm Kiyoka gave her.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 05 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Determination and Thunder
season.detail: Miyo wakes up to her sister and stepmother threatening her; together with Koji, Kiyoka arrives at the Saimori home and demands to see his fiancÃ©e.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 06 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Glamorous Lady of Summer
season.detail: Kiyoka accompanies Miyo to the remains of the Saimori home at her request; later, a stunning visitor comes by their home.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 07 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Nightmares and Ominous Shadows
season.detail: Hazuki and Miyo grow closer through their lessons. Worried, Kiyoka tries to get to the bottom of Miyo's relentless nightmares.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 08 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Drowning in Dreams
season.detail: Though distressed by her nightmares, Miyo keeps pushing herself to be a supportive wife; Arata Tsuruki comes to speak with Miyo while Kiyoka is away.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 09 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Episode 10
season.detail: Arata unveils his real identity and acquaints Miyo with the grandfather she was previously unaware of, offering a potential solution to her nightmares with just one condition.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 10 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: My Mother's Legacy
season.detail: Yoshiro Usuba talks with Miyo about how the marriage between her mother and father came into being and what made her mother make a decision that changed her only daughter's life forever.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 11 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Light in the Darkness
season.detail: Miyo's powers are everyone's last hope of waking Kiyoka from his unconscious state; however, before she can rescue him, she must face the shadow of her past.
season.source: /movies/My Happy Marriage/[AE] My Happy Marriage S1 -Â 12 [Dual] [480p] @Anime_Edge.mkv

season.title: Sakura Arrives at Furin
season.detail: An admirer of strong people with a complete disinterest in the weak, Haruka Sakura, a loner and delinquent high school student, aims to be a fighter at the top of Furin High School. Coming from outside the city, Sakura enrolls in Furin High...
